content: crochet drops place mat for christmas in 1 strand fabel or alpaca and 1 strand glitter drops extra 0-800 drops design pattern no z-586 yarn group a diameter approx 24 cm / 9½ materials drops fabel from garnstudio 50 g color no 106 red or drops alpaca from garnstudio 50 g color no 3620 red and use drops glitter from garnstudio 10 g color no 08 red *yardage does not include glitter as it is a thread * drops crochet hook size 2 5 mm/us c worked with 1 strand fabel or alpaca and 1 strand glitter uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=5352&cid=19
